## Vector4.FromArray() method

Returns a new Vector4 set from the starting index of the given array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromArray(array: ArrayLike<number>, offset?: number): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;</code> | the array to pull values from |
|  offset | <code>number</code> | the offset into the array to start at |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector4`

the new vector
